title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama-2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with one command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models programmatically.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python library.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM and embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-like interface) with multi-model chat, code highlighting, RAG, and admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; synchronous & asynchronous APIs, streaming, embeddings, model management.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple idiomatic interface to chat, generate, and pull models.

title: ollama-cli (community)
summary: Enhanced community CLI with interactive model picker, conversation history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models to Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker image and compose stacks (CPU/GPU) for running Ollama in containers.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repo for building RAG pipelines with Ollama, LangChain, and Chroma/Qdrant vector stores.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake packaging Ollama server and CLI for reproducible installs on NixOS and macOS.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator nodes.

title: ollama-sd-webui
summary: AUTOMATIC1111 extension that uses Ollama LLMs to generate Stable Diffusion prompts and negative prompts.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that chats, generates images, and queries documents via Ollama backends.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate exposing async/await bindings for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with streaming chat, embeddings, and model management; NuGet package available.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds Ollama-powered summarization, continuation, and Q&A commands inside notes.

title: ollama-mistral-7b-rag
summary: Official tutorial walking through building a Mistral-7B RAG system using Ollama and Chroma.
